definition: Mesozoic (geological era 250-65m years ago, covering Triassic 三疊紀|三叠纪, Jurassic 侏羅紀|侏罗纪 and Cretaceous 白堊紀|白垩纪)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: The paper also discusses the structural evolution history of the forel…
sentences.chinese: 並討論了龍門山中段中生代前陸盆地的構造演化歷史。

sentences.english: Songliao Basin is a expanding and rifted basin which was formed in Mesozoic era.
sentences.chinese: 松遼盆地是一中生代形成的伸展裂陷盆地。

sentences.english: Mesozoic faults at the eastern margin of the Songliao Basin were well developed.
sentences.chinese: 松遼盆地東緣中生代斷裂構造十分發育。

sentences.english: Late Mesozioc Large-scale Intra-continental Rotation and Cratonic Destruction of the North China Block.
sentences.chinese: 華北地塊晚中生代大規模陸內旋轉與克拉通破壞。

sentences.english: The Ordos basin on late-Mesozoic exist on a tectonic heat event.
sentences.chinese: 鄂爾多斯盆地在中生代晚期存在一期構造熱事件。

sentences.english: Modern thermal field is mainly the result of the geothermal stage action which continued to develop in Mesozoic Era.
sentences.chinese: 現代熱場主要是中生代熱幕活動繼續發展的結果。

sentences.english: But the Mesozoic, too, began with a mass extinction.
sentences.chinese: 但中生代本身便是以一次大滅絕開始的。

sentences.english: In Ning Zhen region, Mesozoic magmatism was very intense accompanied with frequent multiple phase intrusive activities.
sentences.chinese: 寧鎮地區中生代岩漿作用強烈，多期次侵入活動頻繁。

sentences.english: The Bajiatan complex is located at the center of the Mesozoic Lujiang-Zhongyang volcano-tectonic depression.
sentences.chinese: 巴家灘雜巖體位於廬樅中生代火山構造窪地的中心。

sentences.english: A giant Late Mesozoic A -type granitoid zone occurred in east China can be divided into five sub-zones of two episodes.
sentences.chinese: 沿中國東部出露一條晚中生代巨型A型花崗岩帶。

sentences.english: Anning Basin is a terringenous fault basin developed in Mesozoic Era.
sentences.chinese: 雲南安寧盆地爲中生代陸相斷陷盆地。

sentences.english: Both of them were offset by large-sized sinistral move of the Tanlou fault in Mesozoic.
sentences.chinese: 郯廬斷裂帶中生代大規模左行平移使兩者錯開。

sentences.english: There are rich deposits of oil and coal in Mesozoic formation of the basin.
sentences.chinese: 該盆地中生代地層中含有豐富的石油和煤炭資源。

sentences.english: The Chuxiong Basin is a typical foreland basin formed in the Mesozoic.
sentences.chinese: 楚雄盆地爲中生代形成的典型前陸盆地。

sentences.english: The gold is thought to be formed in Early Mesozoic, not in Yanshanian epoch.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本區金礦牀形成於早中生代，而非燕山期成礦。

sentences.english: The Fuxin basin is a late Mesozoic NNE-trending graben coal-bearing basin.
sentences.chinese: 阜新盆地屬於晚中生代NNE向地塹式煤盆地。

definition: Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
Paleozoic, geological era 545-250m years ago, covering Cambrian 寒武紀|寒武纪, Ordovician 奧陶紀|奥陶纪, Silurian 志留紀|志留纪, Devonian 泥盆紀|泥盆纪, Carboniferous 石炭紀|石炭纪, Permian 二疊紀|二叠纪
third period/tertiary (geological era since the extinction of the dinosaurs at the Cretaceous-Tertiary boundary 65 million years ago)
pre-Cambrian, geological period before c. 540m years ago
fourth period/quaternary (geological period covering the recent ice ages over the last 180,000 years)
Permian (geological period 292-250m years ago)/also written 二疊紀|二叠纪
Holocene (geological period covering approx 12000 years since the last ice age)
